overview: All aboard for trainloads of fun with Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends. See why Gordon gives Thomas a lesson he won't forget and how Henry comes to the rescueï»¿ when disaster strikes. Find out what happens when Thomas gets a chance to pull his very own train... with unexpected results. So join in on the fun and magic on the Island of Sodor with all your favorite friends.
tagline: PEEP-PEEP! All aboard for fun with Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends.
title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas Gets Tricked
